metadata.title: Easy Eggplant Tomato Curry | South Indian Recipe
metadata.description: Easy & Tasty Tomato-Eggplant (Brinjal) Kootu or Curry- South Indian Vegetarian Recipe #shorts

en: [00:00:18.000] Shallots or small onions- 3 shallots or 6 small onions
[00:00:26.000] Eggplant or Brinjal, cubed- 2 small ones
[00:00:34.000] Chili powder- 1 tsp (based on your heat level)
[00:00:49.000] Place a saucepan over medium heat.
[00:00:55.000] Add chana dal & urad dal, let turn golden in color.
[00:00:57.000] Add dried red chilies & curry leaves.
[00:00:59.000] Add shallots, ginger-garlic paste, eggplant & tomatoes. Cook till soft. Add spices & cilantro. Serve hot.
